content:
I am working with the IG https://github.com/cqframework/ecqm-content-r4-2021.git. I need to adjust the measures page that gets produced. I can control the table headers in input/pagecontent/measure.xml, but the body of that page is
<tbody>
{% include table-measures.xhtml %}
</tbody>
which appears to be automatically generated. How would I adjust the body of the measures page?
